content: There’s a new elephant in the room Jessi Hempel There is another large, bright star in Microsoft’s quest for consumer relevance and popularity. Apple, a company once known by the slogan Think Different, has dislodged Microsoft in its reputation as secretive, controlling, and monopolistic in regards to its ecosystem. It’s a strange time when hardcore Linux types find more friends at Microsoft than within the walls at Apple. Granted, it’s a pretty strange time, regardless.
